name: Rocks & Boulders with SFX
author: Mero
info: This script causes Rocks and Boulders when attached to them through AutoGhost to play a sound when they "fake" hitting the ground.
description: This script causes Rocks and Boulders when attached to them through AutoGhost to play a sound when they "fake" hitting the ground.
setup:
Load every enemy of the type rock and change it's attributes as follows.
Attribute 2: SFX to play when the hitting ground.
Attribute 11: GH_INVISIBLE_COMBO "1 by default"
Attribute 12: Script slot number with the above script assigned

Resources

std.zh
string.zh
ghost.zh
